messages.msgSnippet: ... get started ... Musashi (c. 1981) by Eiji Yoshikawa - published by Harper & Row/Kodansha Int l; Ryoma - Life of a Rennaissance Samurai (c. 1999) by
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, ronald sweet
<ronsweet19@y...> wrote:
>
> hello,
> I am new and I wouldlike to know some books I could read to
get started
>
>
> ---------------------------------
> Yahoo! Shopping
> Find Great Deals on Holiday Gifts at Yahoo! Shopping
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
"Musashi" (c. 1981) by Eiji Yoshikawa - published by Harper &
Row/Kodansha Int'l;
"Ryoma - Life of a Rennaissance Samurai" (c. 1999) by Romulus
Hillsborough - published by Ridgeback Press.
Two books to get you started on Samurai history, life, etc.
Mushashi time period is prior to the golden age of samurai and Ryoma
is just before the samurai became all but obsolete.
